review:
Before deciding to start a family, I sought advice from three doctors, none of whom left me satisfied. At that point, I was in good health with no thyroid or diabetes issues but was diagnosed with PCOD. Despite my initial well-being, the treatment from these doctors commenced with hormonal pills and injections, which was daunting, especially considering I endured this for one and a half years. During this time, other health issues arose, including thyroid problems and anemia, and I was on the verge of becoming pre-diabetic. My body's condition left me feeling despondent about the possibility of planning a pregnancy.

My turning point came when a colleague, who had a complicated pregnancy yet delivered a healthy baby through natural delivery, introduced me to Sarda Vani mam. Sarada mam understood my fear of hormone injections and past treatment experiences. She assured me that achieving a natural pregnancy within three months was possible through a change in lifestyle. The only requirements were a healthy diet and regular exercise. She also prioritized improving my general health, addressing my anemia and thyroid issues. My hemoglobin levels are now normal, and my thyroid is under control. I was able to conceive naturally and delivered a healthy baby boy , and we consider this a miraculous outcome. Sarda Vani mam is more than a doctor to us; she is like an angel. We credit her for our last hope and attempt at this pregnancy. I wholeheartedly recommend Sarda Vani mam, as she is not only highly experienced but also genuinely cares about your overall well-being above all else. Thank you, mam, for handling my case with care and giving us the chance to experience this miracle. 😊

review: I consulted Ankura hospital, Banjara hills for a tubectomy surgery. I was asked to get the surgical profile tests done.  I got all the tests done (double the price ) at Ankura hospital only so that it would be easier to send the reports to doctor as they are all one team. In my reports, my Thyroid component Total T3 was abnormally high. I specifically asked the gynecologist whether we can go for surgery with high T3, for which she said yes. So the next day she had put me on complete liquid diet and that next day i was asked to get admitted by 7 am for surgery. My basic tests were done on the day of admission and they had given antibiotics and iv and prepared me for surgery. Then comes the anesthesiologist who doesn’t  give a go ahead for surgery as my Total T3 was high. Then a team of doctors discussed and they wanted to do a free T3 test and fasting glucose test to check for any abnormalities. I was becoming restless by then as almost 7hrs have passed since I got admitted in hospital.********** *** ** *** ******* ********** **** *** ****** ** ******* *** ***** ***** ** *** *** *********** ** ***** ** ***** ** ***** *********** **** **** ** **** ** *** **** **** *** ** ****** ** ** ** **** ******* *** ********* ******* ** *** ****** ** ****** *** So they suggested to call off the surgery and asked me to get the thyroid test done again after 2 weeks and come back.I came back home feeling very exhausted and when opened my file to check the reports again I realized they have changed the previous thyroid report *** **** ************ ******** *** ***** ****** ** ** ****. * ******** ******* **** ** ******* **** **** ****. I went back to confront. The gynecologist became very defensive and said that she is not the right person to answer and asked us to consult the finance head of the hospital. We met him and told what had happened. He called the lab technician and admin and started scolding them. The mistake in the report was a software error it seems which was coming in all the reports. I don’t understand if they knew something like that already existed, why didn’t they correct it? It’s a maternity and children hospital. Just imagine if kids are being treated based on their reports what would happen? ******* ** ******************* didn’t mention the doctors names here because I believe the gynecologist is a good doctor and helping many women conceive and give birth. I also went to her after reading her reviews and recommendation from a family friend. Nevertheless, *** ******** * ********* ***** **** ** **** *** ********** ** *** ********* *** *** **** **** ***** ** *** *** ******* *** ***** *** ***** ** ** ** ******* ****** *** ******** *** *** ********* ***** ** *** **** ** ***** ** **** ********* ****** *** ******** After about 3 hrs of arguments, management had returned the expenses incurred for the lab tests. Please cross check every detail before you get any treatment done at this hospital and never get any tests done there. This is my painful ordeal.

review:
Visited for Pregnancy Check up 
Initially in the month of March my wife got conceived by God's grace and after 5 year's of long wait for getting pregnancy. Before to that she had 2 missed abortions along due to High sugar Levels of 450+and High BP.
Due to Covid 19 pandemic situation, there were no hospitals opened  and no doctor was available and in the situation.Actually we are trying very hard in search of treatment and the best doctor.
Even we tried contacting multiple hospital's, but no one responded us due to Covid 19.
At that stage we were blank and in confusion and  praying to God to help us to save our gifted baby.

Post doing the first Scan for wife, Dr Saradavani promised my spouse u will go home with a healthy baby this time. Don't get worried. Leave everything on me, just follow my medical instructions very strictly.

Another added advantage is Dr Saradavani only will do the scanning regularly to her patients.
The most added advantage for all her patients is she treats everyone like a good family friend.
Dr Saradavani listens to each and every single word very keenly and she won't compromise in any thing while she is treating the patient.
We will not get feeling that we are in the hospital for treatment. She care's everyone equally and responds when we call and text her anytime in the midnight also,if it is genuine and emergency.
I have never seen such a best, caring and responsible doctor in my life.
Dr Saradavani not only treat's the patient's, but she also gives the best advice and suggest the patient's who are middle class and lower middle class financially.
In simple words I can say she is service oriented doctor. She never accepts the credit to her if the treatment is success... She always tells us to trust and believe in God and I am just doing my duty.
So say big thanks to God not to me.
Even it's a million dollar question to me till now how she balances multiple tasks perfectly with out any miss. In fact in the morning she will be going to Kim's cuddles and evening directly she will be treating the patient's at her clinic with out rest and responds to all the patient's when ever they call and text her for anything in emergency 24x7.
She herself calls the patient's and will cross check their current medical situation and condition.
Dr Saradavani is very straight forward in her treatment and she never compromises in terms of treatment.
Finally by God's grace we are blessed with baby boy on 22nd October 2020.
Due to my wife's medical complications, she has done a Caesarean section and our baby is a premature one (34 weeks) but without  any complications with the weight of 2.6 kg.
Finally a Big Thank you to Dr Saradavani from all our family.
We can't forget her till our last breath.
Full and final credit goes to God first and next Dr Saradavani only.

review: Me ane my husband landed up at Genesis Clinic after going through a miscarriage in June 2022. I was genuinely shattered and dint know what to do. The first clinic and the doctor we were going to did not inform us what caused a miscarriage and we weren't really sure of what better we could have done at that point of time.
